title: Logo and Anthem
logo_description: The logo of St. Francis de Sales College embodies the institution's commitment to knowledge, devotion, and service. It features symbols representing wisdom, faith, and community engagement, reflecting the college's core values.
anthem_lyrics: Verse 1: In the pursuit of wisdom and light, We stand united, steadfast in might.
Chorus: SFS, our guiding star, Leading us to horizons afar.
Verse 2: With hearts devoted, we strive and soar, In service and faith, forevermore.
